name: Itadaki Street: Gorgeous King
overview: Gourgeous King is the third title in the Itadaki Street series, and is essentially an expanded remake of Itadaki Street 2. Most of the characters and maps from the previous release have returned, along with eight new maps and a dozen new characters. The main new feature is a story mode called Sugoroku Town, which is based on the board game minigame from the Super Famicom version of Dragon Quest III, and the Official and Tournament modes from the previous edition also return.
